text: 15.43: Fi 3.20-21Guma rimgim, nza mba fhava khɨgap, ana ndi mboga rɨgi, mba fhav, ana gangan nzerigi fhuvara. Guma rimgiap taagia khavi fhav, ana fhav gangan guigira nzerigi. Guma rimgim, nza mba fhava khɨgap ana ndi mboga rɨgi, mba fhav, ana ŋkasŋka ki fhuvara. Guma rimgia kegap taagia khavi fhav, ana guigira ŋkasŋka ki fhav ma.
